title: Emergency Remote Education Design and Operational Strategies in Pandemic Situations

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in college-level scientific disciplines and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, practice-oriented education for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three major technical challenges encountered when applying ERE (Emergency Remote Education) during pandemics
Learners can present two or more effective online class design strategies in smartphone-based environments
Learners can propose three learner engagement strategies for large-scale ERE operations based on real-world cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
